name: Super Mario Continuance: The Video Game
name_original: Super Mario Continuance: The Video Game
description:
Disclaimer: Super Mario Continuance and its creator are not affiliated with Nintendo, or Team ARI. This is a 100% FREE fangame. All credit goes to their respective owners.

In Super Mario Continuance, you become Riba in an emotional and gripping journey with Len Alwenia Foska to find Mario's reincarnation after his tragic demise. To do this, you must run, jump, and explore through a huge interconnected 2D sandbox full of hidden treasures, engaging platforming challenges, and dangerous enemies. Along the way, you will meet beloved characters from Mario's past adventures that each have something unique to add to the story and your ever-expanding moveset.

The game will be released chapter by chapter. Currently on Chapter 1.
